ability.name: Stench
ability.effect: The stench may cause the target to flinch.

ability.name: Drizzle
ability.effect: The Pokémon makes it rain when it enters a battle.

ability.name: Speed Boost
ability.effect: Its Speed stat is gradually boosted.

ability.name: Battle Armor
ability.effect: Protects the Pokémon from critical hits.

ability.name: Sturdy
ability.effect: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.

ability.name: Damp
ability.effect: Prevents the use of self-destructing moves.

ability.name: Limber
ability.effect: Protects the Pokémon from paralysis.

ability.name: Sand Veil
ability.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's evasion in a sandstorm.

ability.name: Static
ability.effect: Contact with the Pokémon may cause the paralysis.

ability.name: Volt Absorb
ability.effect: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move.

ability.name: Water Absorb
ability.effect: Restores HP if hit by an Water-type move.

ability.name: Oblivious
ability.effect: Keeps the Pokémon from being infatuated or falling for taunts.

ability.name: Cloud Nine
ability.effect: Eliminates the effects of weather.

ability.name: Compound Eyes
ability.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's accuracy.

ability.name: Insomnia
ability.effect: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

ability.name: Color Change
ability.effect: The Pokémon's type becomes the type of the move used on it.

ability.name: Immunity
ability.effect: Prevents the Pokémon from getting poisoned.

ability.name: Flash Fire
ability.effect: Powers up the Pokémon's Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.

ability.name: Shield Dust
ability.effect: Blocks the additional effects on attacks taken.

ability.name: Own Tempo
ability.effect: Prevents the Pokémon from being confused.

ability.name: Suction Cups
ability.effect: Negates all moves and items that forces switching out.

ability.name: Intimidate
ability.effect: Lowers the opposing Pokémon's Attack stat.

ability.name: Shadow Tag
ability.effect: Prevents opposing Pokémon from escaping.

ability.name: Rough Skin
ability.effect: Inflicts damage to the attacker on contact.

ability.name: Wonder Guard
ability.effect: Only supereffective moves will hit.

ability.name: Levitate
ability.effect: Gives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

ability.name: Effect Spore
ability.effect: Contact may poison or cause paralysis or sleep.

ability.name: Synchronize
ability.effect: Passes poison, paralyze, or burn to the Pokémon that inflicted it.

ability.name: Clear Body
ability.effect: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

ability.name: Natural Cure
ability.effect: All status condition heal when the Pokémon switches out.

ability.name: Lightning Rod
ability.effect: Draws in all Electric-type moves to boost its Sp. Atk stat.

ability.name: Serene Grace
ability.effect: Boosts the likelihood of additional effects occurring.

ability.name: Swift Swim
ability.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in rain.

ability.name: Chlorophyll
ability.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in sunshine.

ability.name: Illuminate
ability.effect: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon.

ability.name: Trace
ability.effect: The Pokémon copies an opposing Pokémon's ability.

ability.name: Huge Power
ability.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat.

ability.name: Poison Point
ability.effect: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

ability.name: Inner Focus
ability.effect: Protect the Pokémon from flinching.

ability.name: Magma Armor
ability.effect: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming frozen.

ability.name: Water Veil
ability.effect: Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

ability.name: Magnet Pull
ability.effect: Prevents Steel-type Pokémon from escaping.

ability.name: Soundproof
ability.effect: Gives full immunity to all sound-based moves.

ability.name: Rain Dish
ability.effect: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.

ability.name: Sand Stream
ability.effect: The Pokémon summons a sandstorm in battle.

ability.name: Pressure
ability.effect: The Pokémon raises opposing Pokémon's PP usage.

ability.name: Thick Fat
ability.effect: Boosts resistance to Fire- and Ice-type moves.

ability.name: Early Bird
ability.effect: The Pokémon awakens quickly from sleep.

ability.name: Flame Body
ability.effect: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.

ability.name: Run Away
ability.effect: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

ability.name: Keen Eye
ability.effect: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.

ability.name: Hyper Cutter
ability.effect: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its Attack stat.

ability.name: Pickup
ability.effect: The Pokémon may pick up items.

ability.name: Truant
ability.effect: The Pokémon can't attack on consecutive turns.

ability.name: Hustle
ability.effect: Boost the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.

ability.name: Cute Charm
ability.effect: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.

ability.name: Plus
ability.effect: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

ability.name: Minus
ability.effect: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

ability.name: Forecast
ability.effect: Castform transforms with the weather.

ability.name: Sticky Hold
ability.effect: Protects the Pokémon from item theft.

ability.name: Shed Skin
ability.effect: The Pokémon may heal its own status conditions.

ability.name: Guts
ability.effect: Boosts the Attack stat if the Pokémon has a status condition.

ability.name: Marvel Scale
ability.effect: Boosts the Defense stat if the Pokémon has a status condition.

ability.name: Liquid Ooze
ability.effect: Damages attackers using any draining move.

ability.name: Overgrow
ability.effect: Powers up Grass-type moves when the Pokémon is in trouble.

ability.name: Blaze
ability.effect: Powers up Fire-type moves when the Pokémon is in trouble.

ability.name: Torrent
ability.effect: Powers up Water-type moves when the Pokémon is in trouble.

ability.name: Swarm
ability.effect: Powers up Bug-type moves when the Pokémon is in trouble.

ability.name: Rock Head
ability.effect: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

ability.name: Drought
ability.effect: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle.

ability.name: Arena Trap
ability.effect: Prevents opposing Pokémon from feeling.

ability.name: Vital Spirit
ability.effect: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

ability.name: White Smoke
ability.effect: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

ability.name: Pure Power
ability.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat.

ability.name: Shell Armor
ability.effect: Protects the Pokémon from critical hits.

ability.name: Air Lock
ability.effect: Eliminates the effect of weather.

ability.name: Tangled Feet
ability.effect: Raises evasion if the Pokémon is confused.

ability.name: Motor Drive
ability.effect: Boosts the Speed stat when it's hit by an Electric-type move.

ability.name: Rivalry
ability.effect: Deals more damage to Pokémon of the same gender.

ability.name: Steadfast
ability.effect: Boosts the Speed stat each time the Pokémon flinches.

ability.name: Snow Cloak
ability.effect: Boost evasion in a hailstorm.

ability.name: Gluttony
ability.effect: Makes the Pokémon use a held Berry earlier than usual.

ability.name: Anger Point
ability.effect: Maxes the Attack stat after the Pokémon takes a critical hit.

ability.name: Unburden
ability.effect: Boosts the Speed stat if its held item is used or lost.

ability.name: Heatproof
ability.effect: Weakens the power of Fire-type moves.

ability.name: Simple
ability.effect: The Pokémon is prone to wild stat changes.

ability.name: Dry Skin
ability.effect: Reduces HP if it's hot. Water restores HP.

ability.name: Download
ability.effect: Adjusts power based on an opposing Pokémon's stats.

ability.name: Iron Fist
ability.effect: Powers up punching moves.

ability.name: Poison Heal
ability.effect: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned.

ability.name: Adaptability
ability.effect: Powers up moves of the same type as the Pokémon.

ability.name: Skill Link
ability.effect: Increses the number of time multi-strike moves hit.

ability.name: Hydration
ability.effect: Heal status conditions if it's raining.

ability.name: Solar Power
ability.effect: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat in sunny weather, but HP decreases.

ability.name: Quick Feet
ability.effect: Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon has a status.

ability.name: Normalize
ability.effect: All the Pokémon's move become Normal type.

ability.name: Sniper
ability.effect: Powers up moves if they become critical hits.

ability.name: Magic Guard
ability.effect: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.

ability.name: No Guard
ability.effect: Ensures attacks by or against the Pokémon land.

ability.name: Stall
ability.effect: The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.

ability.name: Technician
ability.effect: Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.

ability.name: Leaf Guard
ability.effect: Prevents status conditions in sunny weather.

ability.name: Klutz
ability.effect: The Pokémon can't use any held items.

ability.name: Mold Breaker
ability.effect: Moves can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.

ability.name: Super Luck
ability.effect: Boosts the critical-hit ratios of moves.

ability.name: Aftermath
ability.effect: Damages the attacker landing the fishing hit.

ability.name: Anticipation
ability.effect: Senses an opposing Pokémon's dangerous moves.

ability.name: Forewarn
ability.effect: Determines what moves an opposing Pokémon has.

ability.name: Unaware
ability.effect: Ignores the opposing Pokémon's stat changes.

ability.name: Tinted Lens
ability.effect: Powers up "not very effective" moves.

ability.name: Filter
ability.effect: Reduces damage from supereffective attacks.

ability.name: Slow Start
ability.effect: Temporarily halves the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats.

ability.name: Scrappy
ability.effect: Makes Normal- and Fighting-type moves hit Ghost-type Pokémon.

ability.name: Storm Drain
ability.effect: Draws in all Water-type moves to boost its Sp. Atk stat.

ability.name: Ice Body
ability.effect: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.

ability.name: Solid Rock
ability.effect: Reduces damage from supereffecive attacks.

ability.name: Snow Warning
ability.effect: The Pokémon summons a hailstorm when it enters a battle.

ability.name: Honey Gather
ability.effect: The Pokémon may gather Honey from somewhere.

ability.name: Frisk
ability.effect: The Pokémon can check an opposing Pokémon's held item.

ability.name: Reckless
ability.effect: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.

ability.name: Multitype
ability.effect: Changes the Pokémon's type to match the Plate it holds.

ability.name: Flower Gift
ability.effect: Powers up party Pokémon when it's sunny.

ability.name: Bad Dreams
ability.effect: Reduces the HP of sleeping opposing Pokémon.

ability.name: Pickpocket
ability.effect: Steals an item from an attacker that made direct contact.

ability.name: Sheer Force
ability.effect: Removes additional effects to increase move damage.

ability.name: Contrary
ability.effect: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.

ability.name: Unnerve
ability.effect: Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable to eat Berries.

ability.name: Defiant
ability.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat when its stat are lowered.

ability.name: Defeatist
ability.effect: Lowers stats when HP becomes half or less.

ability.name: Cursed Body
ability.effect: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.

ability.name: Healer
ability.effect: Sometimes heals an ally's status condition.

ability.name: Friend Guard
ability.effect: Reduce damage done to allies.

ability.name: Weak Armor
ability.effect: Physical attacks lower its Defense stat and raise its Speed stat.

ability.name: Heavy Metal
ability.effect: Doubles the Pokémon's weight.

ability.name: Light Metal
ability.effect: Halves the Pokémon's weight.

ability.name: Multiscale
ability.effect: Reduces damage the Pokémon takes when its HP is full.

ability.name: Toxic Boost
ability.effect: Powers up physical attacks when the Pokémon is poisoned.

ability.name: Flare Boost
ability.effect: Powers up special attacks when the Pokémon is burned.

ability.name: Harvest
ability.effect: May create another Berry after one is used.

ability.name: Telepathy
ability.effect: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.

ability.name: Moody
ability.effect: Raises one stat and lowers another.

ability.name: Overcoat
ability.effect: Protects the Pokémon from things like sand, hail and powder.

ability.name: Poison Touch
ability.effect: May poison a target when the Pokémon makes contact.

ability.name: Regenerator
ability.effect: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.

ability.name: Big Pecks
ability.effect: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering attacks.

ability.name: Sand Rush
ability.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in a sandstorm.

ability.name: Wonder Skin
ability.effect: Makes status moves more likely to miss.

ability.name: Analytic
ability.effect: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves after the target.

ability.name: Illusion
ability.effect: Comes out disguised as the Pokémon in the party's last spot.

ability.name: Imposter
ability.effect: The Pokémon transforms itself into the Pokémon it's facing.

ability.name: Infiltrator
ability.effect: Passes through the opposing Pokémon's barrier and strikes.

ability.name: Mummy
ability.effect: Contact with the Pokémon spreads this Ability.

ability.name: Moxie
ability.effect: Boosts the Attack stat after knocking out any Pokémon.

ability.name: Justified
ability.effect: Boosts the Attack stat when it's hit by a Dark-type moves.

ability.name: Rattled
ability.effect: Some move types scare it and boost its Speed stat.

ability.name: Magic Bounce
ability.effect: Reflect status moves.

ability.name: Sap Sipper
ability.effect: Boosts the Attack stat when hit by a Grass-type move.

ability.name: Prankster
ability.effect: Gives priority to a status move.

ability.name: Sand Force
ability.effect: Boost certain moves' power in a sandstorm.

ability.name: Iron Barbs
ability.effect: Inflicts damage to the attacker on contact.

ability.name: Zen Mode
ability.effect: Changes the Pokémon's shape when HP is half or less.

ability.name: Victory Star
ability.effect: Boosts the accuracy of its allies and itself.

ability.name: Turboblaze
ability.effect: Moves can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.

ability.name: Teravolt
ability.effect: Moves can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.

ability.name: Aroma Veil
ability.effect: Protects allies from attacks that limit their move choices.

ability.name: Flower Veil
ability.effect: Prevents lowering of ally Grass-type Pokémon's stats.

ability.name: Cheek Pouch
ability.effect: Restores HP as well when the Pokémon eats a Berry.

ability.name: Protean
ability.effect: Changes the Pokémon's type to the type of the move it's using.

ability.name: Fur Coat
ability.effect: Halves damage from physical moves.

ability.name: Magician
ability.effect: The Pokémon steals the held item of a Pokémon it hits with a move.

ability.name: Bulletproof
ability.effect: Protects the Pokémon from some ball and bombs moves.

ability.name: Competitive
ability.effect: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat when a stat is lowered.

ability.name: Strong Jaw
ability.effect: The Pokémon's strong jaw gives it tremendous biting power.

ability.name: Refrigerate
ability.effect: Normal-type moves become Ice-type moves.

ability.name: Sweet Veil
ability.effect: Prevents itself and ally Pokémon from falling asleep.

ability.name: Stance Change
ability.effect: The Pokémon changes from depending on how it battles.

ability.name: Gale Wings
ability.effect: Gives priority to Flying-type moves.

ability.name: Mega Launcher
ability.effect: Powers up aura and pulse moves.

ability.name: Grass Pelt
ability.effect: Boosts the Defense stat in Grassy Terrain.

ability.name: Symbiosis
ability.effect: The Pokémon can pass an item to an ally.

ability.name: Tough Claws
ability.effect: Powers up moves that make direct contact.

ability.name: Pixilate
ability.effect: Normal-type moves become Fairy-type moves.

ability.name: Gooey
ability.effect: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.

ability.name: Aerilate
ability.effect: Normal-type moves become Flying-type moves.

ability.name: Parental Bond
ability.effect: Parent and child attack together.

ability.name: Dark Aura
ability.effect: Powers up each Pokémon's Dark-type moves.

ability.name: Fairy Aura
ability.effect: Powers up each Pokémon's Fairy-type moves.

ability.name: Aura Break
ability.effect: The effects of "Aura" Abilities are reversed.

ability.name: Primordial Sea
ability.effect: Affects weather and nullifies any Fire-type attacks.

ability.name: Desolate Land
ability.effect: Affects weather and nullifies any Water-type attacks.

ability.name: Delta Stream
ability.effect: Affects weather and eliminates all of the Flying type's weaknesses.
